node.excerpt: Marconi Beach Reopening The Marconi Beach stairs were damaged by a storm in the winter of 2017. The stairs repairs will be finished, and the beach will be reopened beginning Saturday, June 17, 2017. The Marconi site uplands are a landscape slowly recovering from European land-use practices, which stripped the landscape of topsoil, and then further from the effects of Camp Wellfleet, which added to…

Our host took pleasure in telling us the names of the ponds, most of which we could see from his windows, and making us repeat them after him, to see if we had got them right, Thoreau wrote in his book "Cape Cod" of a memorable visit to an oysterman's shack on the Herring River.  "They were Gull Pond, the largest and a very handsome one, clear and deep, and more than a mile in circumference…

frontmatter.title: Come for the ocean, stay for the pond
